projects.title:
Girvan-Newman Implementation
(COMP4641 Assignment)
projects.abstract: A COMP4641 assignment about social network information analysis. Girvan Newman is an algorithm to detect communities in systems by progressively removing edges from a network.

projects.title:
Padding Oracle Attack
(COMP3632 Assignment)
projects.abstract: A COMP3632 assignment about decrypting AES. This is a hard assignment with complicated concepts. But the course is undoubtedly inspiring.

projects.title:
UST Freshman Chatbot
(COMP3111 Project)
projects.abstract: Our team implemented this LINE chatbot in the notorious course COMP3111. That's the first time I need to learn new framework in a pretty short time and implement the features from scratch.

projects.title: HK Stock Real-Time Monitoring Desktop App
projects.abstract: At that time I was pretty obsessed about making a desktop app for myself to monitor stock price. That's why this product was born and implementing UI through Python QT is definitely not a good experience.

projects.title: Zombie Survival Collaborative Game with Leap Motion (FYP)
projects.abstract: This is my final year project about writing a Virtual-Reality game with Leap Motion control. Our team implemented it in Unity.

projects.title:
Fablead
(Intern Project)
projects.abstract: This is the first React.JS project I was involved. I did this as a website prototype for full-time programmer when I was an intern in Joy Aether Ltd.

projects.title: GymLog
projects.abstract: It is a self-entertained project for me to record personal workout data. I also want to know more about Vue.JS and backend API server construction through coding this web app.

projects.title: Data Visualization Ideas
projects.abstract: This is a very simple project for me to test out combination of web-crawling and data visualization. I have implemented it by making use of Japan sakura blossom data.

projects.title: Online Assessment Platform
projects.abstract: A big project I involved in my first full-time job.

projects.title: Chiron Website
projects.abstract: I updated the website for Chiron Healthcare Ltd. with the latest frameworks, enhancing the overall website speed, performance, stability and SEO.
